name: The Camp of 87'
description:
You and your friends went camping for the first time. However, since you had no experience camping you got lost. You decided to set camp down in the middle of nowhere. All seemed fine until you woke up to screaming. When you look outside the tent your friends are nowhere to be found. Then it arrives. A shadow heads towards you, but stops at the camp fire. It seems to be sensitive to light. But, the fire is about to go out.

Your goal is to find firewood and bring it back to the camp fire.
